definition: whip or lash/to flog/to whip/conductor's baton/segmented iron weapon (old)/penis (of animal, served as food)

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Trypanosoma brucei is the hemoflagellate that causes sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 布氏錐蟲是一種造成嗜睡症的血鞭毛蟲。

sentences.english: Strictly, the term flagella should be used only in relation to bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格來說，“鞭毛”應該僅用於描述細菌的結構。

sentences.english: Strictly the term is now reserved for the bacterial flagellum.
sentences.chinese: 目前該術語專用於細菌鞭毛。

sentences.english: Microtubules are also used in the construction of centrioles, basal bodies, cilia and flagella.
sentences.chinese: 微管還用於建造中心粒，基體，纖毛和鞭毛。

sentences.english: The Leifson staining method is a common method of the flagellum staining of bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 賴夫生染色法是細菌鞭毛染色的一種常用方法。

sentences.english: Finally, man has helped out the dinoflagellates.
sentences.chinese: 最後是人類幫助腰鞭毛蟲擺脫了困境。

sentences.english: Movement of the flagella became slow or stopped.
sentences.chinese: 鞭毛擺動遲緩或停止運動。

sentences.english: Dinoflagellates are microscopic single – celled organisms .
sentences.chinese: 腰鞭毛蟲是細微的單細胞生物。

sentences.english: The strain was gram negative, ellipse cell, no spores and no flagellum.
sentences.chinese: 菌株細胞呈橢球形，革蘭氏陰性，不產芽孢，無鞭毛。

sentences.english: These bacteria have flagella (hair-like structures) at one end, that enable them to move.
sentences.chinese: 這些細菌的一端長有鞭毛，使它們能夠移動。

sentences.english: The so-called "bacterial flagellum " is what propels a bacterium through its microscopic world.
sentences.chinese: 所謂的“細菌鞭毛”推動細菌在微觀世界遊動。

sentences.english: Oomycetes and chytrids (sometimes called water molds) produce motile flagellated spores in sporangia .
sentences.chinese: 卵菌綱和壺菌在孢子囊中產生能動的帶鞭毛的孢子。

sentences.english: The Cytophagocytesis of the flagellate to several micro-algae were compared in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文比較了該鞭毛蟲對幾種藻類的吞噬作用。

sentences.english: VOICE: How fast does the flagellum's propeller spin?
sentences.chinese: 細菌鞭毛轉動得有多快呢？

sentences.english: Helicobacter pylori is a Gram-negative flagellated spiral bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 幽門螺旋桿菌是一種革蘭氏陰性帶有鞭毛的螺旋菌。

sentences.english: The Giardia Lamblia determination method in water and related water quality indexes were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了水中賈第鞭毛蟲的檢測方法和相應的水質指標。

definition: Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
